attributes.action: support the gurkas who foughr for this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the Gurkas who fought diligently for this country be turned away from living here permantly.  All other nations come here freely and are supported by the govenment and have not done one thing to support this country never mind fight for it. So support the GURKAS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
